forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 68. South southwest wind around 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 79. South southwest wind 20 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 45 mph.

weather_report:
As the darkness of early morning envelops Evanston, the beach scene remains largely tranquil, offering only a hint of the lively day that awaits. With mostly cloudy skies overhead and a gentle breeze already stirring, the air carries the soft whispers of an approaching day. Winds from the southwest are brisk, hinting at the stronger gusts that will accompany the daylight hours. By mid-morning, a modest warmth will break through, coaxing the temperature towards a comfortable 79 degrees, making this a matter of layers for anyone stepping out—perhaps a light jacket against the still chill of the morning, but one that can be shed as the sun takes the stage.

Today promises a mix of partly sunny skies, with the atmosphere growing more inviting as the hours unfold. While the beach remains calm for now, the winds may whip the waves into a playful flurry, offering glimpses of the lake’s character, which can change with the whims of the weather. One might find solace in a morning stroll along the shoreline, the cool breezes and the gentle lapping of water providing a perfect backdrop for reflection. As the day unfolds, those adventurous enough might consider a bike ride along the lakeshore or a stop at a local café to enjoy the embrace of an autumn morning, taking advantage of the mild air before the season's chill sets in.
